name: Boston Properties, Inc.
description: Boston Properties, Inc. is a leading publicly traded real estate investment trust (REIT) that focuses on the development, ownership, and management of high-quality office properties in the United States. Established in 1970, the company has a robust portfolio that includes over 50 million square feet of office space located primarily in Boston, San Francisco, Washington D.C., and New York City. Boston Properties is renowned for its commitment to sustainable building practices and has received numerous awards for its efforts in environmental stewardship, including LEED certifications for many of its properties. The company aims to create vibrant, sustainable, and innovative workplaces that enhance the productivity of its tenants while contributing to the communities in which it operates. In addition to office spaces, Boston Properties also engages in mixed-use developments that incorporate retail and residential components, thus fostering a dynamic urban environment. As a trusted name in commercial real estate, Boston Properties remains focused on strategic acquisitions and developments that align with its vision of creating high-performance buildings that meet the evolving needs of the modern workforce.

key_executives.name: Michael E. R. F. A. O'Brien

seo.meta_title: Boston Properties, Inc. | Leading Real Estate Investment Trust
seo.meta_description: Explore Boston Properties, Inc., a premier REIT specializing in high-quality office spaces and sustainable developments in major U.S. markets.

faq.question: What does Boston Properties do?
faq.answer: Boston Properties is a real estate investment trust that develops, owns, and manages high-quality office properties.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Boston Properties?
faq.answer: Owen D. Thomas is the CEO of Boston Properties, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Boston Properties headquartered?
faq.answer: Boston Properties is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts, USA.

faq.question: What types of properties does Boston Properties own?
faq.answer: Boston Properties primarily owns Class A office spaces and engages in mixed-use developments.
